word: H1768 - דִּי - dîy - dee - [idiom] as - போல

sections.paragraph: அந்த, இப்போது, யாருடைய, எது, ஆனால், ஆகையினால், படியினால், போது, மட்டாக, பார்க்கிலும், போல் - எச்சம்
who, which, that, that of, which belongs to, because

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: (Chaldee); apparently for H1668; that, used as relative, conjugational, and especially (with preposition) in adverbial phrases; also as a preposition of: - X as, but, for (-asmuch +), + now, of, seeing, than, that, therefore, until, + what (-soever), when, which, whom, whose.
